column1: The Purple Pig////We decided on the grilled octopus (my personal favorite!)
column3: and grilled broccoli. The octopus was so flavorful and cooked to perfection. It was paired with green beans
column4: fingerling potatoes and salsa verde. The broccoli was really tasty because of the anchovy vinaigrette
column6: and toasted bread crumbs on top. Such a unique and exquisite way to eat broccoli! The turkey leg was probably the only item that didn't wow me as because it didn't seem much different than the turkey leg I can get at a fair. It was drenched in a sweet sauce
column7: topped with lentils and came with bed of cabbage. I like the tapas style of this restaurant and there are other items on the menu I'd come back to try like the roasted bone marrow.
